io.github.mbarre.schemacrawler.tool.linter

Class LinterColumnContentNotNormalized

  • java.lang.Object
    • schemacrawler.tools.lint.Linter
      • schemacrawler.tools.lint.BaseLinter
        • io.github.mbarre.schemacrawler.tool.linter.LinterColumnContentNotNormalized

  • public class LinterColumnContentNotNormalized
extends schemacrawler.tools.lint.BaseLinter
    Test column contents normalization. Detect wether foreign table should have be used.
    Author:
    salad74

    • Field Detail

      • NB_REPEAT_TOLERANCE

        public static final int NB_REPEAT_TOLERANCE
        Repeat tolerance : 1 is the most agressive, duplicates occur since there are at least tow reps of the same value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_TEXT_COLUMN_SIZE

        public static final int MIN_TEXT_COLUMN_SIZE
        The minimal length of the text based column. We consider that a 1-length char based column is acceptable.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
